```{r}
# Load/set options ----
# Load metrics options
metrics_options <- c("Select a metric" = "", "Richness", "E50")

# Add selectors ----

   label = "Select metric", 
   choices = metrics_options
)

# Add contextual information ----
tags$div(
  id = "diversity_title",
  class = "rtitle_class",
  textOutput("selectedMetric")
)

tags$div(
  id = "context_info_div",
  class = "context_info",
  textOutput("contextMetric")
)
```
